Quality Education.reason: This course introduces the essentials regarding the analysis and design of information systems and develops analytical, problem-solving, and teamwork skills.
evidence: This course aims to introduce to our students the essentials regarding the analysis and design of information systems.
After finishing this course, our students will be knowledgeable of analytical, problem-solving, and teamwork skills in information systems analysis and design.
